import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
class roses{
static Scanner cons;
static PrintWriter output;
public int countRose(String str,String patt)
{
int count=0;
int l=str.length();
String subs;
int r=patt.length();
for(int i=0;i+r<=l;i++){
subs=str.substring(i,i+r);
count+=subs.equals(patt)?1:0;
}
return((int)(count));
}
public static void main(String args[])throws IOException{
roses rose=new roses();
cons=new Scanner(System.in);
output=new PrintWriter(System.out);
int T;
String str,patt;
//System.out.println("Lets test!");
T=cons.nextInt();
for(int t=0;t<T;t++){
str=cons.next();patt=cons.next();
output.println(rose.countRose(str,patt));
}
output.flush();
output.close();
}
}
